member.name: P:Microsoft.Preview.WindowsAzure.ActiveDirectory.Authentication.AuthenticationContext.TokenCache
member.summary: Property to customize AAL's token caching behavior. By default, TokenCache is set to an instance of class DefaultTokenCache which is a persistent cache based on PasswordVault. DefaultTokenCache will automatically save tokens whenever you obtain them. Cached tokens will be available only to the application that saved them. The DefaultTokenCache will outlive the application's execution, and will be available in subsequent runs. To turn OFF token caching, set TokenCache to null.
